data.title: Macrolife Signed by George Zebrowski
data.meta_description: Macrolife - George Zebrowski - Easton Press - Rick Sternbach - Science Fiction - Signed Edition by Zebrowski, George and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. No Jacket. SIGNED by the author. Minor shelf and handling wear, overall a clean solid copy with minimal signs of use. Wear commensurate with age and use. Clean unmarked copy. Secure packaging for safe delivery. 1.8. signed by author.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. 1st Edition. Special leather-bound edition with gold stamping. SIGNED on the bound-in limitation page. Additionally SIGNED and inscribed "This copy is for John Douglas, with thanks.". Douglas was a New York editor for Avon and Berkley, among others. Illustrated by Rick Sternbach. Fine; no jacket issued. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Like New. From Easton's The Masterpieces of Science Fiction series. Collector's Edition. Publisher's Notes laid in. Introduction by Ian Watson. Two-page full color illustration before title page. Full blue leather with gilt decoration and page edges. Hubbed spine, silk ribbon bookmark. 284 pp. Full refund if not satisfied. Signed by the author.

Condition: Near Fine. Sternbach, Rick (illustrator). First Edition, Thus. Former owners bookplate on the front pastedown. Signed by the author on a tipped-in publisher's page. Very clean and square, binding tight. Gilt edges perfectly clean. Silk marker ribbon. Collectors notes included. Hardcover in brown leather with gilt decoration.

Softcover. Condition: Very Good+. Rick Sternbach(Cover Artist) (illustrator). First Edition. Macrolife by George Zebrowski (Uncorrected Proof) Signed A firm square copy in printed wrappers. Sunning and mild creases to spine. Author's signature to cover. Copyright 1979 by George Zebrowski, stated. First Edition. 79/1, stated. Printed wrappers. Uncorrected Proof. Signed by the Author on cover and title page. BOOK.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. Rick Sternbach(Cover Artist) (illustrator). First Limited Edition. Macrolife by George Zebrowski (First Limited Edition) Signed A sharp, tight, copy. A bright dust jacket slightly tanned on the interior near the top edge. Not price-clipped. First printing with a full number line 1- 10. 134 of 250 Author's Presentation Copies. Author's signature on the limitations page. BOOK.

First Edition. Octavo. Signed by the author, and additionally inscribed by author Jack Dann to his mother, and with a laid in proof wrapper for the paperback edition. 284(1) pp., The book opens in the year 202`1. Inspired by the possibilities of space settlements, projections of biology and cosmology, and basic human longings, Macrolife is a visionary speculation of the long term future of human and natural history. Filled with haunting images and memorable characters, this is a vivid and brilliant work. Bound in 1/4 dark blue cloth over orange paper covered boards stamped in blind, spine lettering silver. a very nice, sharp cornered copy in unclipped pictorial dust jacket lettered in yellow and white. Near fine.
